channel.title: Time to Dump iTunes
channel.description: Via Wired, there is now a WinAmp plugin that allows you to sync your iPod from WinAmp. Called mlipod, it also allows you to copy songs from your iPod back onto your computer - fantastic. Anyone know a plugin for...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Svein+00:00
item.description:
I am also waiting for better support for podcasts. I have been using WinAmp w/ml_ipod for almost a year and I love it. But I also love podcasts and I like the new way iTunes integrate the two.
I want to do it all from WinAmp... browse podcasts, download and transfer to iPod. So please make the WinAmp/iPod experience even better :D
item.dc:creator: Svein
